content:
chenhdc opened issue #7869:

Hi, we found libzstd_sys.rlib varies from filesystem readdir order with zstd in the 0.11.1 version. And https://github.com/gyscos/zstd-rs/pull/162 had resolved this problem. could bump ztsd version for resolving this problem?

alexcrichton edited issue #7869:

Hi, we found libzstd_sys.rlib varies from filesystem readdir order with zstd in the 0.11.1 version. And https://github.com/gyscos/zstd-rs/pull/162 had resolved this problem. could bump ztsd version for resolving this problem?

alexcrichton commented on issue #7869:

Thanks for the report, I've submitted https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/7870 to do an update.
